sen.e: Ok-gyun KIM, Yong-hyo PAK, and Jae-pil SEO of the Progressive Party (Independence Party), who had doubts about the modernization of Korea under this situation, reached the political and financial leaders of the early-modernized Japan, including Yukichi FUKUZAWA and Shigenobu OKUMA, and deepened exchanges with them..
